metadata.title: CVE-2017-5991 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Artifex MuPDF before1912de5f08e90af1d9d0a9791f58ba3afdb9d465. The pdf_run_xobject function inpdf-op-run.c encounters a NULL pointer dereference during a Fitzfz_paint_pixmap_with_mask painting operation. Versions 1.11 and later areunaffected.

criterions.comment: mupdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
